paragraphs.text:
case class StrucSummary(
    v_structure_summary_ref_id: String , 
    pdb_id: String,
    structure_title: String, 
    experimental_technique: String, 
    ndb_id: String,
    resolution: Float,
    release_date: String,
    deposition_date: String,
    revision_date: String,
    molecular_weight: Float,
    macromolecule_type: String,
    residue_count: Integer,
    atom_site_count: Integer,
    pdb_doi: String
    
)

val ssummary = structText.map(s => s.split(";")).map(
    s => StrucSummary(
            s(0).replaceAll("\"", ""), 
            s(1).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(2).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(3).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(4).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(5).replaceAll("\"", "").toFloat,
            s(6).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(7).replaceAll("\"", ""), 
            s(8).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(9).replaceAll("\"", "").toFloat,        
            s(10).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(11).replaceAll("\"", "").toInt,
            s(12).replaceAll("\"", "").toInt,
            s(13).replaceAll("\"", "")
        )
).toDF()
ssummary.registerTempTable("ssummary")

result.msg: ssummary: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [v_structure_summary_ref_id: string, pdb_id: string, structure_title: string, experimental_technique: string, ndb_id: string, resolution: float, release_date: string, deposition_date: string, revision_date: string, molecular_weight: float, macromolecule_type: string, residue_count: int, atom_site_count: int, pdb_doi: string]

paragraphs.text:
%sql

select resolution
from ssummary
where pdb_id = "4hhb"
